text:
Anybody have success modifying the color of the HubSpot video player play button? I have tried adding either "play_button_color" and "style" definitions to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#video-player|video_player> HubL tag according to docs, but the following doesn't seem to work.

UPDATE: this works and the issue was with HubSpot CDN
